name: Criminal Christmas - Winter Crime
description:
Criminal Christmas - Winter Crime is highly addictive brain puzzle, where you will have to find the differences between two pictures each time you play - have fun and prove your sight skills now!

A must-have for all Spot the difference lovers!

Game Features:
- 47 playable scenes.
- Support for iPad devices.
- Hints and boosters which will help you to find all the evidences.
- iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus support!
- iOS 8 support

Dive into a Christmas spirit now!
